title: Rob Wiblin and Russ Roberts on Charity, Science, and Utilitarianism
description: Rob Wiblin, host of the 80,000 Hours podcast, interviews EconTalk host Russ Roberts about charity, the reliability of data to inform decision-making, and utilitarianism.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
